The two carriers shot a blue beam of light down at the ground(not an
attack).  Then, the two pilots were warped down to the ground.

   "Cybertronians?  I don't believe I've ever heard of your planet," Rasile
said.

   "Right, we've never been in this part of the universe.  Could you tell us
more about this planet, how many people are here and what's happening?"
Zanquar asked.
